attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
If we dont stop the influx of HGV drivers from Europe who 
a) dont contribute to the cost of road maintenance  and
b)dont pay fuel taxes 

our own drivers will not be able to compete, It is not a fair trading situation and we the British Public are subsidising the competition.

It is time we shut the borders , remove all of the people that are sucking out our very life blood and start to compete in an fair and just marketplace.

They should also be forced to buy fuel in the UK hence paying the same duty as our own Hauliers. Thus making the disadvantage currently experienced by our own companies fair and making it possible to compete on an even footing. Our government by their lack of action and their fear of European objection are currently compensating non UK companies and encouraging hardship for our our people.. It must stop

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
